Package arcade.core.sim.input

Class InputLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      • arcade.core.sim.input.InputLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
    public class InputLoader
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
    Custom XML file loader that uses SAX parsing to iterate through XML files.

    XML files should only be one level deep, with all values as attributes. Results are stored in a Box object.
